sources.title: The Giants of Thessaly
sources.description: Title: The Giants of Thessaly Summary: In order to placate the angry gods, who have allowed Thessaly to be overrun with barbarian invaders and beset with natural disasters, King Jason takes his Argonauts on a search for the ... Directed by: Riccardo Freda Actors: Roland Carey, Ziva Rodann, Alberto Farnese Production Company: Alexandra Produzioni Cinematografiche Release Date: 7 July 1963 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 In order to placate the angry gods, who have allowed Thessaly to be overrun with barbarian invaders and beset with natural disasters, King Jason takes his Argonauts on a search for the fabled Golden Fleece. Meanwhile, back at home, his scheming regent is plotting to get his hands on the kingdom--and the queen.

metadata.Plot: In order to placate the angry gods, who have allowed Thessaly to be overrun with barbarian invaders and beset with natural disasters, King Jason takes his Argonauts on a search for the fabled Golden Fleece. Meanwhile, back at home, his scheming regent is plotting to get his hands on the kingdom--and the queen.
metadata.Writer: Giuseppe Masini, Mario Rossetti, Riccardo Freda
metadata.Actors: Roland Carey, Ziva Rodann, Alberto Farnese
